requirements: Knock a Cryo Slime out of the hands of a Cryo Hilichurl Grenadier.
Destroy an Ice Shieldwall Mitachurl's shield.
Defeat a Cryo Samachurl before it is able to create an ice pillar.
Destroy a Cryo Samachurl's ice pillar.
Defeat a Frostarm Lawachurl before its Infused Form can expire.
Break a Cryo Cicin Mage's shield.
Defeat the true ruler of Dragonspine?
Paralyze a Ruin Grader by attacking its weak point.
